channel.title: nft on Blockchain Daily
channel.description: Recent content in nft on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-15
item.description: BitClout Founder’s New Hustle: ‘Coinbase for DAOs’ (6 minute read) DAODAO is a project that aims to make it easy for anyone to set up a decentralized autonomous organization with just a name and a funding goal.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-14
item.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club creator buys CryptoPunks and Meebits (4 minute read) Yuga Labs, the creator of Bored Ape Yacht Club, has acquired CryptoPunks and Meebits from Larva Labs for an unknown sum.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-11
item.description: Payments Giant Stripe Launches Support for Crypto, NFTs (2 minute read) Businesses can now use Stripe as a payment method for crypto and NFT transactions.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-10
item.description: JustCarbon, Likvidi Launch Blockchain Markets for Carbon Credits (2 minute read) JustCarbon and Likvidi have launched platforms that will allow for the trade of tokenized carbon credits.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-04
item.description: Leaked Images Suggest Opensea Plans to Add Solana-Based NFT Support (3 minute read) Leaked images show that leading NFT marketplace OpenSea may be adding Solana-based NFTs.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-03
item.description: Dialect Raises $4.1M to Bring ‘Smart Messaging’ to Solana (2 minute read) Dialect is a smart messaging platform on Solana that enables notifications and wallet-to-wallet chat.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-01
item.description: FTX Pledges Up to $1 Billion for Philanthropic Fund to ‘Improve Humanity’ (2 minute read) Cryptocurrency exchange FTX has announced an up to $1 billion fund for ambitious projects that improve humanity’s long-term prospects.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-28
item.description: Microsoft’s Minecraft Goes Web3 With ‘NFT Worlds’ on Polygon (4 minute read) NFT Worlds is a metaverse built in Minecraft.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-23
item.description: Solana NFT Marketplace Magic Eden Is Airdropping Tokens, Launching DAO (4 minute read) Magic Eden, the top Solana NFT marketplace, is launching a decentralized autonomous organization called MagicDAO.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-22
item.description: Crypto exchange FTX is launching a gaming unit to drive token adoption (3 minute read) FTX is launching a new gaming unit focused on driving cryptocurrency and NFT adoption in the gaming world.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-18
item.description: Interchain Accounts is the biggest upgrade to Cosmos since Stargate (2 minute read) The Interchain Foundation, a non-profit steward of the Cosmos ecosystem, has announced the release of Interchain Accounts, a protocol that allows blockchains to access the application features of other blockchains.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-17
item.description: Twitter lets you tip creators with Ethereum (1 minute read) Twitter is expanding its tipping options to include Ethereum.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: JP Morgan is first bank to enter the metaverse with a virtual ‘Onyx lounge’ (2 minute read) JP Morgan has opened up a virtual lounge in Decentraland.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-15
item.description: “Reverse ISO” will see 20 million more SundaeSwap tokens given away (2 minute read) SundaeSwap, a decentralized exchange on the Cardano blockchain, launched on January 20 and soon became the leading Cardano DEX.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-14
item.description: OpenSea Expands Into the Venture Capital Business (1 minute read) OpenSea is launching an investment arm dedicated to growing the web3 ecosystem.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-11
item.description: Samsung Unveils Crypto Wallet and Storage on New S22 Smartphone (2 minute read) Samsung unveiled Samsung Wallet along with its new Galaxy devices at its Unpacked 2022 event.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-10
item.description: Salesforce tells employees it’s working on NFT cloud service (2 minute read) Salesforce plans to make a cloud service for creating NFTs and releasing content on marketplaces like OpenSea.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-09
item.description: NFT Trading Card Game Skyweaver Wraps Yearslong Tech Build With Public Launch (3 minute read) Skyweaver, a blockchain-based trading card game, has launched an Open Beta after years of development.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-08
item.description: DeFi’s Aave Launches Web 3 Social Media Platform ‘Lens’ (2 minute read) Lens is a web3 social media protocol from Aave that allows anyone to create a non-custodial social media profile and build new social media applications.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-07
item.description: Ethereum Co-Founder Vitalik Buterin Discusses Proposal to Alleviate Network’s Congestion, High Fees (3 minute read) Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin recently shared a tweet indicating that blob-carrying transactions may be added in a near-future hard fork.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-04
item.description: Solana is getting a new incentive rewards mechanism (2 minute read) Step Finance, a Solana-based DeFi protocol, has announced the launch of an incentive mechanism called Reward Options.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-01
item.description: Arcade Launches NFT Lending Platform as Blue Chips Hold Strong (2 minute read) Arcade has launched an NFT lending platform to bring liquidity to the NFT market.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-27
item.description: Reddit tests allowing users to set any NFT as their profile picture, similar to Twitter (3 minute read) Reddit is testing a feature, similar to one recently launched on Twitter, that will let users set any NFT they own as a profile picture.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-25
item.description: Hundreds of Y Combinator alumni join crypto collective to back Web3 startups (4 minute read) Orange DAO is a crypto collective that was formed to scout out and back young crypto startups.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-21
item.description: Facebook and Instagram will reportedly become major NFT marketplaces (8 minute read) Meta is preparing tools for creating and distributing non-fungible tokens (NFTs).

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-19
item.description: Intel To Unveil Bitcoin-mining ‘Bonanza Mine’ Chip at Upcoming Conference (3 minute read) Intel is set to unveil a new Bitcoin-mining ASIC at this year’s ISSCC conference, a yearly gathering of the best and brightest minds of the chip industry.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-11
item.description: BREAKING: Cash App begins rolling out the Lightning Network to its users (Twitter Thread) Cash App is now rolling out the Lightning Network to its users.
